author.name: Mohamed Jaffer
author.title: Senior Technical Engineer at Cdtech Innovations Private Limited

comments.content: As an engineer, I'd choose tools like GitHub Copilot for coding efficiency and TensorFlow for machine learning model development. The AI likely used for this image could be DALL-E, given its creativity. How do you see AI balancing automation and human creativity in engineering tasks?

author.name: Harsh Gaur
author.title: Soft Skills Trainer | Career Counsellor | Employability coach | Teacher | Content Writer | Literature Enthusiast | Aspiring engineer | Student for life

replies.content: Mohamed Jaffer That's a great perspective! Tools like GitHub Copilot have indeed transformed how we approach problem-solving engineering. I completely agreeâ€”platforms like DALLÂ·E showcase how AI can complement human creativity rather than replace it. I believe the real balance lies in letting AI handle repetitive or data-intensive tasks, freeing up engineers to focus more on innovation, critical thinking, and the creative aspects of design. Would love to hear how you personally leverage AI in your workflow to strike that balance!
